languages.text: "Глейто почуял еще один знак. Кровь свежая... Что за игру ведут эти фанатики?"
"Glaito has sensed another mark. This blood is fresh... What sort of game are those fanatics playing?"
languages.original_text: "Глейто почуял еще один знак. Кровь свежая... Что за игру ведут эти фанатики?"

traits.locale_text: "Glaito has sensed another mark. This blood is fresh... What sort of game are those fanatics playing?"

"Glaito has sensed another mark. This blood is fresh... What sort of game are those fanatics playing?"
"Glaito has sensed another mark. This blood is fresh... What sort of game are those fanatics playing?"

languages.text: 「グライトが別の痕跡を感知しました。この血は新しい…あの狂信者ども、一体どんなゲームをしているんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Glaito has sensed another mark. This blood is fresh... What sort of game are those fanatics playing?"

traits.locale_text: 「グライトが別の痕跡を感知しました。この血は新しい…あの狂信者ども、一体どんなゲームをしているんだ？」

languages.text: "Glaito hat eine weitere Fährte gewittert. Dieses Blut ist frisch ... Was spielen diese Fanatiker für ein Spiel?"
languages.original_text: "Glaito has sensed another mark. This blood is fresh... What sort of game are those fanatics playing?"

traits.locale_text: "Glaito hat eine weitere Fährte gewittert. Dieses Blut ist frisch ... Was spielen diese Fanatiker für ein Spiel?"

languages.text: « Glaito a senti une autre proie. Ce sang est encore frais... À quoi ces fanatiques jouent-ils donc ? »
languages.original_text: "Glaito has sensed another mark. This blood is fresh... What sort of game are those fanatics playing?"

traits.locale_text: « Glaito a senti une autre proie. Ce sang est encore frais... À quoi ces fanatiques jouent-ils donc ? »

languages.text: «Glaito ha encontrado otra marca. Esta sangre es reciente... ¿A qué clase de juego están jugando estos fanáticos?».
languages.original_text: "Glaito has sensed another mark. This blood is fresh... What sort of game are those fanatics playing?"

traits.locale_text: «Glaito ha encontrado otra marca. Esta sangre es reciente... ¿A qué clase de juego están jugando estos fanáticos?».

languages.text: “格雷托感觉到了另一个印记，这些血是不久前留下的……那些狂热分子又在耍什么花样？”
languages.original_text: "Glaito has sensed another mark. This blood is fresh... What sort of game are those fanatics playing?"

traits.locale_text: “格雷托感觉到了另一个印记，这些血是不久前留下的……那些狂热分子又在耍什么花样？”

languages.text: "Glaito bir şey daha sezdi. Bu kan taze. Bu fanatikler ne tür bir oyun oynuyor?"
languages.original_text: "Glaito has sensed another mark. This blood is fresh... What sort of game are those fanatics playing?"

traits.locale_text: "Glaito bir şey daha sezdi. Bu kan taze. Bu fanatikler ne tür bir oyun oynuyor?"
